info.name: vjhgbmn
info.description:
API for an imaginary E-Commerce store to demonstrate API Builder capabilities in Postman

Contact Support:
 Name: Postman Team name
 Email: simplekart@postman.com

query.description: Number of items to be displayed

response.name: OK - Successful pull of items

item.name: Get item details from the database

variable.description: (Required) Id of the item to pull details of

response.name: OK - Successfully obtained order details

item.name: Post order details to the database
